name: BattleAirship
description:
FB:

https://www.facebook.com/BattleAirship/

TW:

https://twitter.com/leoTheCoder

Join the battle!

Captian, equip your airship with strategic weaponries. 

Team up with your friends and win your battle with cooperation. 

Customize your airship with your unique touch!

Control:

wasd: Move the airship

Mouse L: Attack

Mouse R: Dash

Key R: Activate ultimate weapon. Each battleship has its own unique ultimate weapon.

Key Space: Activate defense function. Each ship wing has its own unique functionality
